verbs.description: [ARG1: solar panels] [V: stolen] [ARGM-LOC: off roof of new brighton church] a church in new brighton minnesota was trying to cut costs by adding solar panels now it found itself in the hole after someone stole the panels right off the roof pastor amy wick moore new brighton church united church of christ new brighton minnesota
